query.value:
@concat(
  'TRUNCATE TABLE JSON_TB1;',
  'INSERT INTO JSON_TB1 (COL1, COL2) VALUES (''',
  string(activity('Lookup File1').output.value),
  ''', ''',
  string(activity('Lookup File2').output.value),
  '''); ',
  'SELECT REPLACE(CONCAT(COL1, COL2), '']['', '','') FROM JSON_TB1;'
)

@{concat(
  'TRUNCATE TABLE JSON_TB1;',
  'INSERT INTO JSON_TB1 (COL1, COL2) VALUES (''',
  string(activity('Lookup File1_copy1').output.value),
  ''', ''',
  string(activity('Lookup File2_copy1').output.value),
  '''); ')}
SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(CONCAT(COL1, COL2), '][', ','),'"[', '[ '),']"', ']'),'\"','"') as col1 FROM JSON_TB1;

activities.name: Copy CSV-DS-TXT FILE TO JSON
activities.description: ErrorCode=DelimitedTextMoreColumnsThanDefined,'Type=Microsoft.DataTransfer.Common.Shared.HybridDeliveryException,Message=Error found when processing 'Csv/Tsv Format Text' source 'user_info.txt' with row number 2: found more columns than expected column count 1.,Source=Microsoft.DataTransfer.Common,'

source.query: SELECT REPLACE(test, '\\', '') AS cleaned_json FROM test_json_tb;
SELECT REPLACE(test, '""', '"') AS cleaned_json FROM test_json_tb2;
SELECT REPLACE(test, '""', '"') AS cleaned_json FROM test_json_tb3;
SELECT REPLACE(test, '""', '"') AS cleaned_json FROM unformatted_json_data;

scriptLines: derivedColumn1 aggregate(employees_pos_tb_col = toString(collect(@(emp_id=emp_id, fullName=fullName, position=position)))) ~> aggregate1
